title: Apps stopping every time i open them
content:
When a try to open certain apps on my phone (Pixel 3), they open for 2 seconds and then close, popping up the message "App XXX keeps stopping".

-I have the last software for my Pixel 3'
-Already try restarting it
-Cleared the cache and storage on the apps that present this problem
-Cleared the cache and storage on the Google Play Services and Play Store apps
-Uninstalled the updated for Google Play Services
-Have the last update for Google Play Services and Play Store app
-Already tried all of the above in safe mode

A few apps that don't work:
-Gmail app
-Adobe Reader app
-Google app
-Netflix app
-Tripadvisor

Pixel 3
Android 10

Thanks for the help!
